original_title: Irish fashion designer Martha Nolan buried as Montauk death probe continues | Fox News
article_summary: "Martha Nolan, an Irish fashion designer, was found dead on a yacht in Montauk, NY. Her cause of death remains inconclusive, with toxicology results pending. Her family has met with homicide detectives, and concerns have been raised about the use of xylazine, a tranquilizer not approved for human use, in her potential drug mix."</s>
